場.definition: large place used for a specific purpose; stage; scene (of a play); classifier for sporting or recreational activities; classifier for number of exams

場區.definition: (sports) section of a court or playing field; (computer chip manufacture) field area

場區應急.definition: site area emergency (nuclear facility emergency classification)

場合.definition: situation; occasion; context; setting; location; venue

場外應急.definition: general emergency (or "off-site emergency") (nuclear facility emergency classification)

場次.definition: the number of showings of a movie, play etc; screening; performance
